intro_text: As the patrol is marking the border lines, a gang of rogues bursts from the beach grass! An ambush!
decline_text: The patrol turns tail and races away! The borders are left open for the rogues to muddy.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol descends into battle without a second thought, eventually driving the rogues away.

s_c immediately leaps to protect {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} Clanmates. {PRONOUN/s_c/poss/CAP} ferocity in battle terrifies the rogues. Realizing that they've sorely underestimated the Clan slugcats, the rogues turn tail and run.
s_c revels in the battle, leaping into the fray with {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} teeth bared and claws unsheathed. The rogues are quickly driven away by the patrol.

fail_outcomes.text: The rogues are terrifyingly coordinated and use the patrol's shock and confusion against them. The patrol slugcats are picked off one by one, and only a couple manage to escape the slaughter.

history_text.scar: m_c was badly scarred when rogues ambushed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} patrol.
history_text.reg_death: This slugcat was killed when rogues ambushed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} patrol.

fail_outcomes.text: Taken by surprise, the patrol scatters and loses cohesion. The rogues are quick to take advantage of the confusion, and r_c is badly wounded, forcing the patrol to retreat.

history_text.scar: m_c was badly scarred when rogues ambushed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} patrol.
history_text.reg_death: This slugcat was killed when rogues ambushed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} patrol.

intro_text: As the patrol is marking the border lines, a gang of rogues bursts from the beach grass! An ambush!
decline_text: r_c turns tail and races away! The rogues have {PRONOUN/r_c/object} far outnumbered; warning the Clan is more important than playing the hero.

success_outcomes.text: Stunned for a moment, r_c is nearly caught in the teeth of the first rogue, but {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/manage/manages} to dodge and weave through the onslaught of attacks, eventually escaping the fray and pelting towards camp with yowls of warning bursting from {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} lungs.

s_c snarls at the rogues, outnumbered but not cowed. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/s_c/throw/throws} {PRONOUN/s_c/self} at the intruders with such ferocity that the rogues are taken aback. Alarmed by the Clan slugcat's lack of fear and self-preservation, the rogues freeze. s_c sees {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} opportunity to run and takes it, racing back to the camp to gather more warriors and return.

fail_outcomes.text: s_c snarls at the rogues, outnumbered but not cowed. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/s_c/throw/throws} {PRONOUN/s_c/self} at the intruders with such ferocity that the rogues are taken aback. The shock only lasts a moment before they descend on the warrior once more. Eventually, s_c has no choice but to escape before {PRONOUN/s_c/subject}{VERB/s_c/'re/'s} killed.
The rogues greatly outnumber r_c and have no trouble killing the lone slugcat. {PRONOUN/r_c/poss/CAP} body is discovered the next day, covered in wounds and cold.

history_text.reg_death: This slugcat was killed when rogues ambushed {PRONOUN/m_c/object} while on a solo patrol.

intro_text: As the patrol is marking the border lines, a gang of rogues stalks out of the beach grass to confront the Clan slugcats!
decline_text: The patrol turns tail and races away! The borders are left open for the rogues to muddy.

success_outcomes.text: The rogues posture and jeer, eventually provoking a battle. The Clan slugcats are strong, however, and the rogues seem to be weakened by hunger. The patrol easily drives the intruders away.
The rogues posture and jeer, eventually provoking a battle. The Clan slugcats are strong, however, and after a short fight, the rogues are forced to retreat.

s_c takes the lead, confronting the gang with confidence. Eventually, the rogues admit that they've been struggling to find enough prey and were looking to steal richer territory from the Clan. Tensions are eased when s_c informs the rogues of a prey-rich forest outside of c_n territory.

intro_text: There are dark clouds on the horizon, and p_l wonders if the patrol should continue.
decline_text: The patrol decides to head back early.

success_outcomes.text: While it's pretty gray up there, the promised rain never comes.
The slugcats get wet in the rain, but the patrol is otherwise successful.
s_c makes a careful judgment, and the patrol keeps going. They stick to the clifftops, avoiding the low beaches as the rain begins to pour around them.
It's not worth the risk - s_c convinces the patrol to head for home.

fail_outcomes.text: There is a downpour, and a sudden flood from the overflowing river sweeps all of the slugcats in the patrol away. Some manage to ride the waves, paddling for their lives, but many are lost forever.

history_text.reg_death: This slugcat was drowned by floodwaters.

intro_text: While on patrol, r_c notices some suspicious pawprints in the wet sand on the beach.
decline_text: {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/decide/decides} not to investigate.

success_outcomes.text: The pawprints lead to a trespassing rogue. r_c quickly hides {PRONOUN/r_c/self} in the grass on the sand dunes and sets up an ambush that sends the rogue fleeing off c_n territory.
r_c soon realizes that the pawprints smell of c_n. Someone must have wandered through this section of the border recently, but it's not a threat.
The pawprints lead to a trespassing rogue. s_c throws {PRONOUN/s_c/self} at the rogue, hissing furiously, and drives {PRONOUN/r_c/object} off c_n territory.

Boldly, s_c follows the pawprints to a trespassing rogue and confronts them. Fur puffed up and scowling, {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} {VERB/s_c/demand/demands} the rogue leave c_n territory. Intimidated by {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} confidence, the rogue gives in and leaves without a fight.

fail_outcomes.text: It turns out they were r_c's own pawprints... r_c huffs with embarrassment, suddenly grateful {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}{VERB/r_c/'re/'s} alone.

The pawprints lead to a trespassing rogue. s_c tries to set up a trap by using the tides to cut off the rogue's escape path, but {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} {VERB/s_c/aren't/isn't} as smart as {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} {VERB/s_c/think/thinks} {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} {VERB/s_c/are/is}. The trap fails, and the rogue wanders on.
Following the trail with {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} nose to the ground, r_c doesn't see the blow that kills {PRONOUN/r_c/object}.

history_text.reg_death: m_c was killed by an invading rogue.

intro_text: As the slugcats move along the shoreline, they spot something massive moving beneath the water.
decline_text: The slugcats are feeling remarkably incurious today.

success_outcomes.text: It's Nessie! The patrol trots up, exchanging a nice squidcada for a nice deep-water jetfish, both creatures trading the respective delicacies that are hard for the other to obtain.

fail_outcomes.text: The patrol is so wrapped up trying to work out what the creature is that r_c topples into the water. It solves the mystery though, as Nessie propels r_c back onto the shoreline with one gentle, immense flipper.

intro_text: p_l waves r_c over with {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} tail. What's that?!
decline_text: r_c isn't interested, and the patrol continues on their way.

success_outcomes.text: The massive frog-scavenger creeps up the rocks, slow and unnatural. The patrol watches, breathless, until it's out of sight. Well, p_l huffs. Maybe toads grow bigger than {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} thought. Terrifying.

fail_outcomes.text: Frozen, the slugcats watch the massive lumbering frog, the size of a scavenger and just as bipedal. It halts and, like the rumble of thunder, issues a massive croak that creaks like cracking wood. All r_c can do is shiver.

intro_text: The patrol comes across a salamander.
decline_text: The patrol walks right past the water, neither of them noticing the other.

success_outcomes.text: r_c sees the salamander just in time! With a loud battle-cry, r_c drives the salamander out of the territory!
r_c unsheathes {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} claws, puffs {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} fur out to as far as it'll go, gathers {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} courage, and drives the salamander from the border.
s_c unleashes all {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} battle experience, darting this way and that, ripping chunks of salamander hide out as {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/drive/drives} it into the distance.
s_c barely spots the melanistic salamander in the water! {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} slowly approaches the salamnder. It's frills are soon twitching as it follows s_c home!
s_c barely spots the melanistic salamander in the water! {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} slowly approaches the salamnder. It's frills are soon twitching as it follows s_c home!
s_c barely spots the salamander in the water! {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} slowly approaches the albino salamander. It's frills are soon twitching as it follows s_c home!
r_c barely spots the melanistic salamander in the water! {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} slowly approaches the salamnder. It's frills are soon twitching as it follows r_c home!
r_c barely spots the salamander in the water! {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} slowly approaches the albino salamander. It's frills are soon twitching as it follows r_c home!

fail_outcomes.text: All r_c's attempts to drive the salamander off only make it more excited! r_c is forced to hide and wait for it to calm down.
r_c had no time to react- The salamander pulled them under the water, not even enough time to yowl out in alarm.

history_text.scar: This cat got a scar from a salamander ambush.
history_text.reg_death: This cat was killed in a salamander ambush

fail_outcomes.text: r_c peers down from dry land, dripping wet... They thanked the Void, the salamander let go when r_c put a spear in it's side.

history_text.scar: This cat got a scar from a salamander ambush.
history_text.reg_death: This cat was killed in a salamander ambush.

intro_text: The patrol comes across a salamander.
decline_text: The patrol walks right past the water, neither of them noticing the other.

success_outcomes.text: p_l hisses at the salamander, and the rest of {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} small team {VERB/p_l/back/backs} {PRONOUN/p_l/object} up. The salamander flinches back, hissing loudly, apparently shocked by the display. The patrol breaks out into yowls and caterwauls until the salamander loses its nerve and runs from the c_n border into the distance.

The patrol paces towards the salamander, claws out, fur up, backed up with the courage of their Clanmates. The salamander breaks into a hissing fit, but that's their opportunity to attack, covering each other as they push the creature away from their territory.

s_c calls out a battle plan, and the slugcats flow into it, carefully covering each other and driving the salamander backwards until it loses its nerve, tucks tail, and runs from c_n territory, deep into the wilderness.

s_c barely spots the melanistic salamander in the water! {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} puts a paw out to stop the patrol, and slowly approaches the salamander. It's frills are soon twitching as it follows s_c home!
s_c barely spots the albino salamander in the water! {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} puts a paw out to stop the patrol, and slowly approaches the salamander. It's frills are soon twitching as it follows s_c home!

r_c barely spots the melanistic salamander in the water! {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} puts a paw out to stop the patrol, and slowly approaches the salamnder. It's frills are soon twitching as it follows r_c home!
r_c barely spots the albino salamander in the water! {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} puts a paw out to stop the patrol, and slowly approaches the salamnder. It's frills are soon twitching as it follows r_c home!

fail_outcomes.text: All r_c's attempts to drive the salamander off only make it more excited! r_c is forced to hide and wait for it to calm down.
r_c had no time to react- The salamander pulled them under the water, not even enough time to yowl out a warning. By the time the patrol turned around, the salamander was gone with r_c

history_text.scar: This cat got a scar from a salamander ambush.
history_text.reg_death: This cat was killed in a salamander ambush

fail_outcomes.text: r_c had no time to react- The salamander pulled them under the water. The patrol heard r_c yowl, and jumped in to pelt the salamander with spears. r_c is rushed to the Cleric's den.

history_text.reg_death: This cat was killed in a salamander ambush.

Mobbed by slugcats and near-blind with the blood in its eyes, the salamander flees from c_n, crying pitifully.
